actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to amend section 5 (e) of the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to remove the ceiling on the excess shelter expense deduction, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Food Stamp Act of 1977: (1) to remove the ceiling on the excess shelter expense deduction from household income; and (2) to set a ceiling of $80 on the dependent care deduction, adjustable annually to reflect changes in the Consumer Price Index.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5 (e) of the Food Stamp Act of 1977 to remove the ceiling on the excess shelter expense deduction, and for other purposes.
